actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to facilitate convenient Selective Service registration by having secondary schools make available registration forms to students.

summary.text: Requires any public or private secondary educational institution which has enrolled students who are required to register under the Selective Service Act to make available registration forms to students.

titles.title: A bill to facilitate convenient Selective Service registration by having secondary schools make available registration forms to students.
